entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Trenton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:36 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 6:25 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: E 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 6:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
